snippet: Risk-taking, rule-breaking ideas were as hard to find among the more than 50 Super Bowl commercials as good taste in a GoDaddy ad.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column holds too many of the more than 50 Super Bowl commercials lacked risk-taking or rule-breaking ideas; highlights several high points.
lead_paragraph: Risk-taking, rule-breaking ideas were as hard to find among the more than 50 Super Bowl commercials as good taste in a GoDaddy ad.

headline.seo: Super Bowl Commercials, From Charming to Smarmy
headline.main: Judging the Super Bowl Commercials, From Charming to Smarmy
headline.print_headline: Judging the Super Bowl Commercials, From Charming to Smarmy
